snippet.title: Batman: The Enemy Within - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
The official launch trailer for episode one of Telltale’s “Batman: The Enemy Within,” featuring action and dialogue from major characters. Episode title: “The Enigma”

https://telltale.com/store/batman-season-2/
